mdRecord.dcterms:title: Emblemata / Andreae Alciati Iurusconsulti clarissimi
Alciati, Andrea, 1492-1550. Emblematum liber
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Alciati, Andrea, 1492-1550
Bonhomme, Macé, active 1536-1569
Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
Eskrich, Pierre, approximately 1530-approximately 1590
Rouillé, Guillaume, 1518?-1589
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Apud Gulielmum Rouillium, Sub scuto Veneto
mdRecord.dcterms:description: With the exception of the Tabula (p. [1]-[4] at end), each page is enclosed within a four-part ornamental border.
Woodcuts by Pierre Eskrich; some ornamental borders are signed PV, probably for Pierre Vase (i.e. Eskrich). Cf. Mortimer, R. French 16th cent. books, I, p. 16.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: First work in volume with: Emblemes d'Alciat. -- A Lyon, 1549. Unidentified ownership stamp on title page. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 400.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Emblems--Early works to 1800.
